response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are extending an offer to purchase this product for $1,150,000. We understand its worth to you might be higher, but we hope this proposal presents a fair and attractive deal. Should you choose to accept, we guarantee a seamless transaction and prompt delivery. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
